root.message: The FOOTNOTE_6 field for indicator 3-8-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: [^6]: Xu, K., Evans, D. B., Carrin, G., Aguilar-Rivera, A. M., Musgrove, P., and Evans, T. (2007), “Protecting Households From Catastrophic Health Spending,” Health Affairs, 26, 972–983. Xu, L., Evans, D., Kawabata, K., Zeramdini, R., Klavus, J., and Murray, C. (2003), “Households Catastrophic Health Expenditure: A Multi-Country Analysis,” The Lancet, 326, 111–117.
